com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.structured

Class StructuredLoggingService<I extends Request,O extends Response,L>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.DecoratingService<I,O,I,O>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.SimpleDecoratingService<I,O>
        • com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.structured.StructuredLoggingService<I,O,L>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the Request type
    O - the Response type
    L - the type of the structured log representation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service<I,O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KafkaStructuredLoggingService

    public abstract class StructuredLoggingService<I extends Request,O extends Response,L>
extends SimpleDecoratingService<I,O>
    A decorating service which provides support of structured and optionally externalized request/response content logging.
